name: Rest-Pause (3RM Load) ~8 min
time_per_session_breakdown: 2-3 clusters x ~2 min each + ~2 min rest => ~8 min total
overview_and_execution: Use ~3RM load. Perform 3 reps, rest 30s, then do sets of 2 reps until failure, then singles until failure. Increase weight 2.5â€“5 lbs once you reach ~10 total reps.
example_application: E.g., Bench Press at 225 lbs (3RM): 3 reps, rest 30s, 2 reps, rest 30s, 2 reps, rest 30s, then singles to failure. If you total ~10 reps, move to 230 lbs next session.
important_notes: Maintain strict form; heavy rest-pause can tax technique. Reduce load by 10% if you plateau.
